channel.title: Urban Developement on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in Urban Developement on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Buenos Aires Transport Demand Planning
item.description: Challenge The COVID-19 pandemic and the lockdown measures implemented in 2020 had a significant impact on mobility in the Metropolitan Area of Buenos Aires (AMBA), adding new constrains to the travel behaviours of residents and businesses.

item.title: Enhancing Health Planning in the Philippines
item.description: Challenge The delivery of health services in the Philippines is highly fragmented across different levels of administration. Health systems are autonomously run by local government units (LGUs), whether they are barangays (the most local level), cities, municipalities, or provinces.
